title: Christine Lampard says baby Patricia has started to walk as she shares excitement at 'adventures'
text:

Christine Lampard has revealed that her baby daughter Patricia has started to walk.

The TV presenter, 40, took to Instagram to post an adorable photo of the one-year-old's feet, saying she was looking forward to "adventures" with her little one.

In the snap, which had a black white filter on top, Patricia sported heart print pyjamas as she crossed her tiny feet under her baby bouncer chair.

Christine, who is married to footballer Frank Lampard, captioned the image: "These little feet have started to walk! The adventures start now."

She added footprint and a baby faced emoji, while also tagging Frank in her post.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

The picture was flooded with comments from the couple's famous friends.

"She's growing up so fast!" Kate Thornton posted.

Julia Bradbury commented: "Time to get those extra arms & eyes fitted."

Christine and Frank celebrated their tenth anniversary at the Pride of Britain Awards on Monday.

They enjoyed a night off from parenting to ring in ten years since they met for the first time at the awards in 2009.

Speaking to the Mirror Online at the event, Frank said: "Christine is the best, she's being humble, she's the best mum. She wakes up all the time. I sleep through!"

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images)

Christine was modest when she enthused her 13-month-old daughter was an "easy" newborn.

Christine gushed Pride of Britain was a "very special evening" for the couple.

The mother-of-one noted it was "extra special" because she was acting as a judge for the glittering event this year.
description: Christine, 40, took to Instagram to post an adorable black and white photo of her one-year-old little girl's feet
